attributes.action: Get the BBL (British Basketball League) more publicity
attributes.additional_details: The BBL has the potential to compete with the Euroleague and the NBA. Both the Euroleague and the NBA gain exposure from many countries around the world, while the BBL struggle to get fixtures televised in the UK. The talented players in the BBL deserve to be showcased and they don't deserve to retire having gone under the radar. The BBL deserves publicity!
attributes.background: The BBL is the most prominant basketball league in the UK. This league boasts such teams as Leicester Riders and Newcastle Eagles. This league also boasts players such as Charles Smith and Aaron Jordan. As well as marketbale teams, this league boasts players from around th world. Help the BBL thrive

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government to provide more funding for basketball, or to fund an advertising campaign to promote it.
